Articles.Content:
Hi all.

Long story short, my Shuttle launcher had a small run in with the Launchpad, and both of them lost, in explosive fashion.

Unfortunately though, unlike the last 20+ times this happened, I cannot repair the pad. I'm in sandbox mode so money isn't an issue, and when I right click the pad, it says no repairs are needed.

But when I try launching a rocket, there is still a hunk of melted concrete on the pad, and launching at a 45* angle isn't exactly ideal....

Any thoughts?
This should really be in the support forum, but you could try blowing it up again? Perhaps it's just a visual glitch.

Indeed. Support forum here we come!

If you don't mind, please check out this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

We'll need to know what OS, game mode, maybe some pictures, and a save file might be helpful. Or maybe some more details that explain how you managed to glitch it.

Cheers,

~Claw
